item.description:
This meetup now needs a host due to difficult circumstances.  If you are willing to fill that roll, please contact AJ to update the event posting.

Join NHCer Andrew for Open Mic Night on Wednesday Night! You can reach him by text at 508-524-9988.

The Outer Space is a 21+, 79 capacity, café, listening room and lounge. There is a beautiful 1920s style bar room that serves over 80 varieties of Top Shelf and Local beers.

Come check out their weekly Open Mic Night at The Outer Space. Anyone can sign up to do anything from playing music to reading poetry. Sign-ups start at 7:00 PM.

At 8:30 the main feature comes on. One is acoustic, one is electric. One likes peanut butter, one likes chocolate. Okay, they both like chocolate. One is 5’6”, one is 6’5”. Together they write and play songs.

SWEET TALK RADIO is the husband and wife team of Kathrin Shorr & Tim Burlingame. This dynamic duo, based in Los Angeles, draws on the combination of Shorr’s captivating vocals and Burlingame’s lyrical guitar. Their music has earned them recurring spots on the iTunes Singer Songwriter chart and the ears of music.
item.name: Open Mic Night at Outer Space
